            "title": [
              [
                "func send(from, password, to, body string) error {\n\tmsg := \"From: \" + from + \"\\n\" +\n\t\t\"To: \" + to + \"\\n\" +\n\t\t\"Subject: Hello there\\n\\n\" +\n\t\tbody\n\n  auth := smtp.PlainAuth(\"\", from, password, smtpAuthServer)\n\treturn smtp.SendMail(smtpSendServer, auth, from, []string{to}, []byte(msg))\n}"
